title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: EQ-5D-5 L and MLHFQ predict all-cause mortality and HF-related hospitalization in ATTR-CM.
**TACTICAL WIN [ROADMAP]**: Integrate ePRO platforms with predictive analytics for early intervention monitoring.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸŸ¡ NOTABLE]**: FDA prioritizing PROs in trial approvals, focusing on HR-QoL improvements.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may limit clinical validity of PRO-based endpoints.
